name: Badly Drawn OK Games - Evolving Through!
name_original: Badly Drawn OK Games - Evolving Through!
description:
You start as a little bacteria and evolve your way through!

Press esc to quit anytime.

Controls :

For Bacteria: W, A ,S ,D to move, SPACE to attack.  Collect 100 DNA to Evolve!  You die when you touch another bacteria.

For Fish: A,D to change angle, W to accelerate forward. Get to the land.

Created by: Kemal Tarık Nehrozoğlu
